Struct gamma_table_t¶

  • Defined in File types.h

Struct Documentation¶

struct gamma_table_t¶

A lookup table for the lower incomplete gamma function from ICON mo_2mom_mcrph_util.f90 at incgfct_lower_lookupcreate:

with constant a from x=0 to the 99.5% value of the normalized incomplete gamma function. This 99.5 % - value has been fitted with high accuracy as function of a in the range a in [0;20], but can safely be applied also to higher values of a. (Fit created with the matlab-program “gamma_unvoll_lower_lookup.m” by Ulrich Blahak, 2008/11/13).

The last value in the table corresponds to x = infinity, so that during the reconstruction of incgfct-values from the table, the x-value can safely be truncated at the maximum table x-value.

Public Functions

template<class A>
A look_lo(A x) const¶

Get the lower incomplete gamma function value for a given x coordinate.

Parameters

  • x: Coordinate at which to evaluate the gamma function.

template<class A>
A look_up(A x) const¶

Get the upper incomplete gamma function value for a given x coordinate.

Parameters

  • x: Coordinate at which to evaluate the gamma function.

void init_gamma_table(const uint64_t &nl, const uint64_t &nl_highres, const double &a)¶

Init lookup table for the incomplete gamma function. From ICON mo_2mom_mcrph_util.f90 incgfct_lower_lookupcreate Create a lookup-table for the lower incomplete gamma function

with constant a from x=0 to the 99.5% value of the normalized incomplete gamma function. This 99.5 % - value has been fitted with high accuracy as function of a in the range in [0;20], but can safely be applied also to higher values of a. (Fit created with the matlab-program “gamma_unvoll_lower_lookup.m” by Ulrich Blahak, 2008/11/13).

The last value in the table corresponds to x = infinity, so that during the reconstruction of incgfct-values from the table, the x-value can safely be truncated at the maximum table x-value.

Parameters

  • nl: Number of bins in the table.

  • nl_highres: Optional number of bins for the high resolution table.

  • a: Value where the incomplete gamma function shall be interpolated around.

Public Members

uint64_t n_bins¶

Number of bins of the lookup table.

uint64_t n_bins_highres¶

Number of bins of the lookup table with higher resolution if desired.

double a¶

Value at which the function is being fit.

std::vector<double> x¶

always starts at 0 and has distant dx.

std::vector<double> x_highres¶

as x but with higher resolution.

double dx¶

Distance of each value in x.

double dx_highres¶

Distance of each value in x_highres.

double odx¶

1/dx.

double odx_highres¶

1/dx_highres.

std::vector<double> igf¶

Values of the inc. gamma function at (a,x).

std::vector<double> igf_highres¶

Values of the inc. gamma function at (a,x) with higher resolution.
